# Repository Info

This repository is automatically synchronized with the following settings:

## GitHub Settings Recommendations

### General

- **Description**: A powerful Figma plugin that converts websites to editable Figma designs with accurate visual replication
- **Website**: https://github.com/kbishopzz/HTML-to-Figma
- **Topics**: `figma`, `figma-plugin`, `html-to-figma`, `web-scraping`, `design-tools`, `converter`, `typescript`, `webpack`

### Features to Enable

- ✅ Issues
- ✅ Wiki (for extended documentation)
- ✅ Discussions (for Q&A and community)
- ✅ Projects (for roadmap)

### Branch Protection

Consider adding branch protection rules for `main`:

- Require pull request reviews before merging
- Require status checks to pass before merging

## Social Preview Image

A social preview image would be great! Consider creating:

- Size: 1280×640px
- Content: Screenshot of plugin + before/after comparison
- Style: Clean, professional, showing the conversion process
